definition: the Xia or Hsia dynasty c. 2000 BC/Xia of the Sixteen Kingdoms (407-432)/surname Xia
surname Luo/old name of several rivers (in Henan, Shaanxi, Sichuan and Anhui)
special/unique/distinguished/especially/unusual/very/abbr. for 特克斯[te4 ke4 si1], tex
Charlottetown, capital of Prince Edward Island, Canada
Charlotte Brontë (1816-1855), English novelist, eldest of three Brontë sisters, author of Jane Eyre 簡·愛|简·爱[Jian3 · Ai4]
pinyin: Xia4 luo4 te4 · Bo2 liang2 te4

definition: Charlotte Amalie, capital of the United States Virgin Islands (USVI)
pinyin: Xia4 luo4 te4 A1 ma3 li4 ya4

sentences.english: Fortunately we haven't seen any of them show up in the Charlottetown riding.
sentences.chinese: 幸运的是我们并没有看到他们出现在夏洛特城选区。

sentences.english: Sorry Charlotte, it's time for us to be head in' home. Say good night, Tiana.
sentences.chinese: 抱歉，夏洛特，我们得回家了说晚安吧，蒂安娜。

sentences.english: Two years later, Fielding's wife Charlotte succumbed to a fever and died.
sentences.chinese: 两年后，菲尔丁的妻子夏洛特屈服于发烧和死亡。

sentences.english: Charlotte uttered a scream, and hid her face in her apron.
sentences.chinese: 夏洛特发出一声尖叫，用围裙把面孔遮起来。

sentences.english: I was quite touched by this, though Charlotte was a bit perplexed.
sentences.chinese: 我很是感动，虽然夏洛特为此有点不知所措。

sentences.english: Unfortunatley, Charlotte showed up just in time and dragged Lucy away.
sentences.chinese: 不幸的事，夏洛特正在这时赶到，一把拉开了露西。

sentences.english: I'm already doing that. - I love you, Charlotte .
sentences.chinese: 我叫夏洛特，很高兴认识你。

sentences.english: My daughter Charlotte received four condolence cards.
sentences.chinese: 而我的女儿夏洛特则收到了四封慰问卡片。

sentences.english: Serve Charlottes drizzled with apricot jam and cream passed separately.
sentences.chinese: 吃时，在夏洛特上分别淋上杏酱或奶油。

sentences.english: The man later died at Charlotte Hungerford Hospital while awaiting Life Star.
sentences.chinese: 此人后来在夏洛特亨格福德医院被抢救过程中死亡。

sentences.english: How did Charlotte County come to be a mecca for retirees?
sentences.chinese: 夏洛特县是如何演变成老年人养老圣地的呢？

sentences.english: Eventually Charlotte was reduced to begging on the streets.
sentences.chinese: 最后夏洛特被迫沦落到沿街乞讨。

sentences.english: In 2004 the Charlotte Bobcats join the team to reach 30.
sentences.chinese: 2004年的夏洛特山猫队的加入达到30只。

sentences.english: And so for the next year Anne lived in Charlottetown, and went to college every day.
sentences.chinese: 这样，第二年安妮住在夏洛特镇，每天去上学。

definition: Phoenix, capital of Arizona/also 鳳凰城|凤凰城[Feng4 huang2 cheng2]
Harper (name)/see also 斯蒂芬·哈珀[Si1 di4 fen1 · Ha1 po4]
Brooklyn, borough of New York City
Michel or Mitchell (name)/George Mitchell (1933-), US Democratic party politician and diplomat, influential in brokering Northern Ireland peace deal in 1990s, US Middle East special envoy from 2009
